long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use our extension to save resources directly into Labstep. 

Labstep is a flexible research environment that connects your notebook, inventory, applications and data in one collaborative workspace.

SAVE WITH ONE CLICK.

When you visit a product page of one of our supported suppliers (a red dot will appear on the extensions) open the extension and click "Create Resource". Your new resource will then appear in your inventory on Labstep.
